name: Charms
content:
Charms

Name Rank Tags Timing Target Range Check Price Description
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.charms.C9YZd7MGPZ5OS6pH]{Slash Card I} 1 Charm, Consumable Move Self Close None 40

During this Main Process, the target gains a +2D bonus to [Weapon Attack] damage rolls. The effect of multiple Slash Cards (regardless of rank) do not stack.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.charms.sMuOvVEtVqa2FGAC]{Hex Card I} 1 Charm, Consumable Move Self Close None 40

During this Main Process, the target gains a +2D bonus to [Magic Attack] damage rolls. The effect of multiple Hex Cards (regardless of rank) do not stack.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.charms.0SsXA3k7jd99xNV0]{White Construct I} 1 Charm, Consumable Move Self Close None 40

When the target next applies a [Barrier], increase the rating of that [Barrier] by +2D. The effect of multiple White Constructs (regardless of rank) do not stack, and this effect is removed after being applied once, or at the end of the scene.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.charms.SG26V07MMFSOmD4c]{Elemental Card I} 1 Charm, Consumable Move Self Close None 40

Select one: [Flame] [Cold] [Shock] [Blight] [Holy] or [Spirit]. During the target's Main Process, they deal damage of the chosen tag. (CR11): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.charms.o6nsuTmJMYVdMPXz]{Iron Gut Card I} 2 Charm, Consumable, Rare Move Self Close None 45

The next time the target would take damage, reduce the damage by -5. The effect of multiple Iron Gut Cards (regardless of grade) do not stack, and the effect is removed after being applied once, or at the end of the scene.

@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.charms.YQE0jao5MDGTVaAB]{Pure Eye Card I} 2 Charm, Consumable Move Self Close None 60

The next time the target performs Prop Analyze, they gain a +1D bonus to the check. The effect of multiple Pure Eye Cards (regardless of grade) do not stack, and the effect is removed after being applied once, or at the end of the scene. (CR9): This item has no effect.

@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.charms.VcHhkqGwjLZ6itmn]{Adroit Hand Card I} 2 Charm, Consumable Move Self Close None 60

The next time the target performs Prop Disable, they gain a +1D bonus to the check. The effect of multiple Adroit Hand Cards (regardless of grade) do not stack, and the effect is removed after being applied once, or at the end of the scene. (CR9): This item has no effect.

@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.charms.YkXhX33Al1Zyp8xk]{Physical Card I} 3 Charm, Consumable Move Self Close None 50

During the target's current Main Process, magical damage they deal changes to physical damage. (CR13): This item has no effect.

@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.charms.wPReOqGgTd6ZkK8B]{Healing Card I} 4 Charm, Consumable, Rare Move Self Close None 60

During the current Main Process, the target gains a +10 bonus to [Recovery]. The effect of multiple Healing Cards (regardless of grade) do not stack.

@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.charms.GrB8gPN8bycBpNfS]{Magical Card I} 5 Charm, Consumable Move Self Close None 70

During the target's current Main Process, physical damage they deal changes to magical damage. (CR15): This item has no effect.

@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.charms.OXkhCasjTnqzgWhX]{True Sight Card I} 5 Charm, Consumable Move Self Close Basic (2d6+5/Detection Difficulty) 70

This item targets everything in range that has a [Detection Difficulty]. The target removes [Concealed] or [Hidden]. You do not have to apply this effect to your allies.

@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.charms.TCK4FbX1aESpRb9L]{Focus Card I} 6 Charm, Consumable Move Self Close None 90

During the target's current Main Process, the target's [Normal Moves] become [Safe Moves]. (CR16): This item has no effect.

@Compendium[loghorizontrpg.charms.wpzGNocvGfMeUI1D]{Quick Card I} 7 Charm, Consumable Move Self Close None 170

During the target's current Main Process, the target receives an extra minor action. The effect of multiple Quick Cards (regardless of grade) do not stack. (CR17): This item has no effect.
